attributes.action: Help first time buyers get on the property ladder as house prices have gone up monsterously, but wages have not ,
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Im our particular case, me and my fiancee both hold two jobs, are saving for a deposit. My fiancee's jobs are both self employed and one of my jobs is as well. We are finding it increasingly difficult to attempt to purchase a house in the place where we were both raised. The house prices have escalated to a ridiculous rate but our wages have not gone up with this. We are having to rely on my parents borrowing us a large amount of money to put down as a huge deposit and then pout an agreement in place to repay them in ten years.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
